name: Spaceport Babel
description:
Welcome to Spaceport Babel. Our spaceport features a wide range of amenities, services, and comforts to make your travel more enjoyable.

Disclaimer: We do not offer human translations for our signage. You cannot get refunds for missed flights.

Description -----------------------------------------------

This is not a game, but an experience. Explore and get lost in an alien spaceport. Try to catch your flight.

Controls -----------------------------------------------

  • WASD : Movement
  • Mouse : Look
  • Enter : Pause
  • Escape : Exit Game (when paused)
